item.title: Lime Bikes, constant wheelchair, safety issue, 31st December
item.description:
Lime bike obstructions in Haggerston Ward breach Sec 130/137 Highways Act 1980 & Equality Act 2010. Abate this nuisance or I will seek a court order via Sec 130AD or contact the Ombudsman. Barriers of access and trip hazards for elderly and disabled

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pownall Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gully covers need rethinking, 31st December
item.description:
The gully covers along the bus stop bay beside Waitrose have been repaired to the same desigb as failed previously - and have failed again. I'm surprised that no-one has stolen the dozen covers that have been popped out of place by the busses. Any pedestrian could twist their ankle and fall into the path of traffic because of this situation.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Moss Hall Grove, Fallow Corner, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign is too low on its post, and has been turned 90 degrees, 31st December
item.description:
This sign has always hung dangerously low, an H&S threat to pedestrians. It requires turning to face traffic coming into Moss Hall Grove from Ballards Lane AND raising well above pedestrians' head level - this may require a taller pole.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Moss Hall Grove, Fallow Corner, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Covered/hidden accidented car has been left there for a few months/years, 31st December
item.description:
This car has been parked there for a long time. It looks like it has been in an accident and was covered to hide it. The number plates have been removed. It's parked on a public pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Adolf Street, Southend, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on bus stop, 31st December
item.description:
Graffiti appeared on back of bus stop overnight It’s disturbing this is happening so close to parked cars and homes This area is prone for fly tipping and now is attracting the wrong crowd to graffiti CAMERAS ARE NEEDED IN THIS AREA URGENTLY
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Westhorne Avenue, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead goose, 31st December
item.description:
There is a dead goose in the pond at priory gardens, it’s the dog side of the pond. 2nd photo is from the double gates looking to towards the brown gates. Would be grateful if someone can collect it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Court Road, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: Road sign bent and twisted round, 31st December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Moss Hall Grove, Fallow Corner, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves and rubbish not fixed for months, 31st December
item.description:
Leaves , weeds along the pavements on the green between westhorne Avenue and rancliffe gardens not picked up for months Rubbish flytipped on lawn simply thrown to pavement and kicked against walls of homes to disappear int leaves its piled up for months
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Westhorne Avenue, Eltham

item.title: Manhole cover os 53 Mount Road end of Mount Drive, 31st December
item.description:
The manhole cover is broken as it makes a loud clunking noise every time a vehicle drives over it. Please can this be fixed with a matter of urgency as it is keeping residents awake at night. This has been reported before and the case was closed but the issue has not been fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mount Road, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
